headline: Can Live Nation (LYV) Balance Strong Concert Demand With Intensifying Regulatory Scrutiny?
summary: Live Nation Entertainment reported third quarter results on November 4, 2025, posting revenue growth to US$8.50 billion but a decrease in net income and earnings per share compared to the prior year, alongside updates on ownership and regulatory investigations. The company's largest global live music study highlighted persistent strong demand for concerts and live events worldwide, even as legal scrutiny over ticketing practices intensified. We'll now examine how news of regulatory scrutiny...
